title: Saw Yasuo wall Miss Fortune's Bullet Time.

replies.body: Yasuo's wind wall is so satisfying, I wish I could play Yasuo every game...but I'm just not good enough with him.

> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=5oB21Ed6,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-03-23T04:40:43.597+0000)
>
> Yasuo's wind wall is so satisfying, I wish I could play Yasuo every game...but I'm just not good enough with him.

That doesn't stop every single Yasuo I get on my team.
I must practice! So that I don't disappoint if I ever get matched up with you haha. Nice Summoner Icon btw

> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=5oB21Ed6,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-03-23T04:40:43.597+0000)
>
> Yasuo's wind wall is so satisfying, I wish I could play Yasuo every game...but I'm just not good enough with him.

blocking a yasuo q when you are both playing yasuo and the opponent blocks your q

It's just like using some hard engage champ and jump right on top of Lee Sin, only to see him single target kick you away or just, ward hop as if nothing happens while you've already burnt your ulti and possibly summoners.

Feels.

> [{quoted}](name=SEKAI,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=5oB21Ed6,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-03-23T11:42:21.322+0000)
>
> It's just like using some hard engage champ and jump right on top of Lee Sin, only to see him single target kick you away or just, ward hop as if nothing happens while you've already burnt your ulti and possibly summoners.
> 
> Feels.
It hurts me as I love MF, she's the best designed ADC in the game, and she is counted by his ability that's not even a goddamn ultimate, lol.
Why wouldn't Yasuo windwall her Bullet Time?
